# Inlezen data

```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(readODS)
cor_mat <- read_ods("scres_cor_mat.ods")

rownames(cor_mat) <- cor_mat$Schaal

cor_mat$Schaal <- NULL

cor_mat$alpha <- NULL
```

## Netwerk correlatie plot

```{r cars}
library(qgraph)


qgraph(cor_mat, cut=0, layout="spring", 
       title="Scres schalen", nodeNames = colnames(cor_mat))
```
